The doctors had placed him on dialysis and he was confined to a hospital room on oxygen, connected to monitors and with multiple IVs. Apparently, he had expressed to many family members, “This is not what I want.” But neither he nor his family members knew how to ask for or create any alternatives; nor had any doctors discussed changing treatment goals or asked him what he really wanted for himself. A visitor had brought his eldest son a copy of our book, “It’s OK to Die,” and explained to the son that the book would bring clarity to the situation and help them to make choices that could bring peace to the whole family. According to reports, the elderly gentleman saw his son reading this book and asked to look at it himself. He read it through and then called his doctors in for a conference. He said, “Take all of these tubes out of me, I’m going home. I want a hospice called in.” Next, he gently explained to his family why he made this choice and how he wanted to die in his own home. They agreed to honor his decisions. Once home, his family fed him his favorite meals. His extended family and friends came to his home say their “thank you’s, I love you’s, and good-byes.” Children sat in his lap. He died one week later, in his favorite chair, wrapped in his favorite blanket, in his sleep, with his family at his side. This is how most Americans want to die” - Dr. Monica Williams-Murphy

What we want to accomplish and how you can help!
The “It’s OK to Die” organization has 3 main measurable goals for this project.  We call these “The Three R’s”:

REDUCE Patient suffering at the End of Life.
REDUCE Family suffering at the end of the life of a loved one.
REDUCE Spending by families, organizations and government on unnecessary and unwanted, and often futile medical interventions
Our overarching project goal is to change the End-of-Life paradigm which, presently, is causing needless suffering for millions of elderly and terminally ill Americans, as well as wasting billions of dollars for families and taxpayers.
First and foremost, The "It’s OK to Die" authors want to educate people about their options and help them to create an action plan in order to reduce pain and suffering for themselves and their families. However, a secondary and huge benefit of this information/education will be that End-of-Life care costs will be cut dramatically - for families, providers, insurance and government. Cutting spending on healthcare is not a primary reason for this effort, but it is the natural result of patients being able to control what is done to them (or not) at the end of their lives. How will we do this? We hope to share the simplified knowledge of End-of-Life care processes and decision matrices developed by Dr. Williams-Murphy, with individuals and organizations who are contemplating, facing, or directly involved in End-of-Life decisions:

People currently living with a terminal illness, or who are elderly or infirm 
Families with loved ones who have a terminal illness, or who are elderly or infirm
Doctors and other caregivers who deal with patients who have a terminal illness, or who are elderly or infirm 
Institutions that render services to the elderly and infirm 
So, how will your Pledge be spent? The “It’s OK to Die” organization will spearhead and invest toward End-of-Life education in America by:

Providing the book, “It’s OK to Die,” to individuals, hospitals, religious organizations, assisted care facilities/providers, and hospice providers.
Set-up and provide training/seminars not only for medical professionals, but also for individuals and groups who want to proactively manage the End-of-Life process. 
Distribute copies of the book to elected representatives and their staff within relevant departments, throughout the United States including Medicare/Medicaid, Congress and state level officials. 
Use multiple media outlets (social media, Internet, traditional outlets…) as funds permit, to reach as many people as possible… to let them know there are answers and that they can take control and determine their own path. 
Through these actions and awareness campaigns, we hope to transform the discourse in America about death and dying. “Death Panel” conversations will be replaced with conversations about how to choose medical care which promotes peace, closure and even healing at the End of Life

story:
HELLO! 

Greetings! My name is Franceska Rolda and I am currently a third year in college majoring in sociology. 

I have a true passion for helping people and putting smiles on people’s faces. My goal in life the saying "If I can't change the world at once let me change it one person at a time" What I mean by this is: If I can give positive vibes and be a good example for others than maybe that can be a pay-it-forward and be past on to other people! 

I want to be able to do this throughout the world and I have been given an amazing opportunity to help in Guatemala with Volunteers Around the World! A NGO (Non-Governmental Organization) devoted to improving the standard of living for those that live in some of the most poverty stricken communities of the world. Our focus is to provide communities with access to medical treatment, medication, nutritional security, clean water, and health education.

http://volunteersaroundtheworld.org

 

 Here's where you come in! 

In order for me to be able to help people in Guatemala I am raising money to purchase my plane ticket, transportation in Guatemala, medical supplies and let's not forget food and lodging! 

All the money received will go directly to those expenses!

The Impact

This trip will not only be aiding those in Guatemala who are in dire need of medical attention but it will also be helping me further pursue my life goal of being able to reach out to those who need a helping hand.

Other Ways You Can Help

If donating is asking too much no worries! 

Please share this with your friends and families!

story:
Short Summary

 

Our friend Terry Smith has started a fitness journey that we would like to help her with. She has begun taking Zumba classes and training for 5K's to stay fit, despite her physical limitations.

So many of us admire her strength of character and her giving spirit, that we would like to give back to her, a way to help her reach her goals. Completing a 5K is much harder with a regular wheelchair, as are the turns and twists you may want to do in a Zumba class. A sports wheelchair would be much better to exercise in!

The Wheelchair is an Invacare TopEnd Pro-2 All-Sport Wheelchair. Detailed product information can be found here: http://www.topendwheelchair.com/OurChairs/Product-Details.aspx?id=35

What We Need & What You Get

We need $2700.00 to purchase the wheelchair and possibly some accessories

If you donate $20 or more and wish to, your name will appear on the card we present Terry when she receives this gift. If you give a gift of $100 or greater, you can write a personal note of encouragement to be given. You are also welcome to remain anonymous!

If we don't reach our goal, we will still take all the funds raised to go as a first deposit to purchasing one.

The Impact

It's not every day that there is a clear opportunity, a way to help someone who means so much. A new chair is a small token to show a well-deserving friend how much we care and how much we are rooting for her to challenge herself to new goals and heights. The Invacare Top End Pro 2 Sports Chair has a 5K race attachment that we allow much greater ease and smoothness when traveling long distances.

Risks & Challenges

 Our Plan is to surprise Terry with this campaign so we hope that there is a great turnout of support to this challenge so she can see the difference her humble and giving spirit has had on others.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
MySense helps you better manage the wellbeing of yourself or a loved one through the analysis of data points related to routines and behaviours in the home such as: hydration, nutrition, sleeping, activity and independence. MySense's proven technology and science analyses thousands of your data points identifying patterns of what is normal and flags any subtle changes which may need closer attention.

We have been working directly with NHS trusts, health organisations and charities for the past couple of years, helping provide peace of mind and reassurance to families about an individual's wellbeing. Now, for the first time, MySense is **available to buy directly via the Indiegogo 'Perks'.** 

This is an exclusive opportunity, which ends on December 17th.

Our leading edge technology and artificial intelligence brings unprecedented wellbeing insights. MySense is leading the way through the continuous analysis of thousands of unique data points per individual per day. This is not telecare; this is smart care, preventative care, where you can keep ahead of problems by viewing your wellbeing patterns or those of the loved one who is maybe vulnerable or on their own.

As our case studies and life-changing results continue to grow, so too does the interest from the media. MySense has featured in national newspapers, magazines, blogs and radio. We are also proud to have been recognised with industry awards. 

MySense is simple to install and easy to use. The sensors are designed to be discreet and blend into the background of your home.

Your MySense kit includes x 6 sensor motion and vibration sensors, a stylish smartwatch (for step counts and heart rates), a sleep sensor and a smart plug. Once you download the app, activate the sensors and the Gateway home hub, you will gain access to your wellbeing data. Our customer service team is also on hand to support you with any questions.

We are on a mission to better lives through the power of data. Our vision is to provide wellbeing solutions for every person in every home and empower people to be healthier, more independent and in control of their future wellbeing. Our timeline shows where we are on this journey.


We believe in making a positive difference to society. That's why we collaborate with other like-minded organisations who share our values and vision for a better world. By becoming a MySense customer you too are helping a greater cause, such as the planting of four trees for every MySense kit bought. 

We are an experienced team of driven and talented individuals with a proven track record. They bring specialist knowledge in the fields of business, technology, data and wellbeing.

story:
Beddit

Unlike other wellness trackers, Beddit doesn’t require you to wear anything. You just place the ultra-thin Beddit sensor under your bed sheet and sleep on it.

In the morning, you get a full report of your sleep quality, heart rate, breathing rhythm, movement, sleep stages, snoring, and the sleeping environment; noise level and light. You get also personalized coaching tips and guidance based on your results how you can improve your sleep and wellness.

Because of our passive method, your sleep is natural and undisturbed. Therefore, the results of how you sleep will be more accurate.

We need your help to finalize the design, order the first production batch of sensors and to complete the mobile application. We have developed this product for over two years together with leading sleep experts and we have almost ten years of experience in ballistocardiography (BCG), the underlying scientific method.

We have had the Beddit Pro sleep tracker for professional use on the market over 18 months. Now, we want to make this available for everyone at a reasonable price with a captivating and useful app by introducing the new Beddit for your wellness.

Sleep is an essential part of our lives and one of the key factors in our wellbeing. We spend almost a third of our lives in bed. Approximately half of us experience some sort of sleep disorder. Some don't even notice that their exhaustion is originating from poor sleep.

We want to give you insight on how you sleep so that you can improve your sleep and improve your overall performance and quality of life.

Beddit in media

How Beddit can help you

Beddit is essentially a convenient sleep and wellness tracker working as a life-style and stress management tool. You can track your sleep, wellness and stress levels and get coaching on how to overcome any issues. Sleep is the third key element of your wellbeing, in addition to nutrition and exercise. Beddit is not a medical device, but with Beddit, you can manage your sleep.

It is important for everyone to manage stress no matter if it is originating from exercise, work or from the environment. By understanding the quality of your sleep, one can take steps to improve sleep which helps to reduce levels of stress in our daily lives.

Managing sleep is especially important for athletes. Sleep equals recovery; athletes need to sleep to improve performance and to avoid overtraining. Sleep is also the most important factor when trying to lose weight and helps improve your skin and hair.

Features

Sleep Measurement
Bed time
Awakenings and bed exits
Sleep time
Sleep latency  (the time it takes to fall asleep)
Resting heart rate
Sleep quality
Snoring and Breathing
Personalized Coaching
Stress and recovery management
Lifefestyle management
Sleep management
Wellness Diary
Mood and tiredness tracking
Things that affect sleep
Alarm
Basic alarm clock
Smart alarm clock
Sleep Environment
Noise
Light
Other
Social sharing
Cloud Backup
Trends and History

How to install

You place the Beddit ultra-thin film sensor on your mattress. The sensor film has adhesive on one side. Remove the cover paper and attach the sensor like a sticker to your mattress under the bed sheet or mattress cover. The sensor is plugged into a regular low voltage USB power supply provided with the sensor, so there is no need to change or charge any batteries.

After this easy setup, you just sleep. The sensor is fully passive and it does not emit an electromagnetical field or radiation etc. It is totally safe to sleep on and it is not directly touching your body. The sensor measures your presence in the bed (sleep rhythm) and your movements (actigraphy) during the night and also the movements of your heart (heart rate) and your breathing movements (breathing rhythm and snoring).

The data

The sensor forwards the measurement information automatically to your mobile device over Bluetooth and the information is analyzed in the Beddit app. Beddit app also uses the light and noise sensors of your mobile device and adds these parameters into the analysis of your sleep, wellness and sleeping environment.

The results and any nightly events are shown on a timeline with a summary and a sleep score based on your sleep quality. You can look at the sleep score break down to see the different stages of your sleep and wellness results. You also get personalized coaching tips and guidance on how to improve your sleep, performance and wellness. You can also view your sleep history with trends and compare these with provided recommendations.

In addition, Beddit has an integrated smart alarm clock that wakes you up in the desired time window, when you sleep lightly. This enables you to wake up refreshed, instead of feeling drowsy. You can also set the alarm to wake you when you have had enough restorative sleep and recovery if you don't need to wake up at certain time.

Science behind Beddit

Beddit is based on ballistocardiography (BCG), a scientific method for measuring cardiorespiratory functions.

It detects the tiny movements caused by your respiration and heartbeat, and converts the data into useful sleep and wellness information and guidance.

Why we need your support

We need your help to finalize the design, order the first production batch of the sensors and to complete the mobile application.

We already have first prototypes of the device ready, and first test users are using them with a limited version of the app. The money will be used to finalize production tools, order components for the first production batch, and further development and testing of the app for both iOS and Android platforms.

We are also doing scientific work to develop the measurement methods and algorithms. The work will produce publications including one doctoral thesis.

Challenges

The risks with the hardware, Beddit sensor, are well mitigated and we have experience in successfully bringing products to the market, as well as managing the supply chain, production, and logistics. The iOS and the Android apps are scheduled to be launched simultaneously. The app development is progressing as planned. First application prototypes with limited features are already being used by the first test users. The hardware works seamlessly with both platforms.

We promise timely and transparent communication throughout the process!

About Beddit

Beddit (founded in 2006) is headquartered in Finland, with a subsidiary in Silicon Valley, California. Beddit is specialized in sensor technology, sophisticated signal analysis algorithms and captivating user interaction. By utilizing these technologies and the methods called actigraphy and ballistocardiography, Beddit creates and markets sensor products and applications for automatic tracking of sleep, heart rate and breathing. There are no uncomfortable sensors to wear. Beddit products and services are globally used by medical and training professionals as well as by consumers and the use cases extend from medical applications to wellness and fitness use.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, you can still help us to meet our goal!

  • Spread the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Does it work with two persons sleeping in the same bed?

A: The product works also if there are two sleepers in the bed as long as the other sleeper is not directly on your sensor. If you leave the bed during the night and the measurement stays on and the other person stays in the bed, your sensor might measure some wrong results from the other person who stays in the bed especially if he/she sleeps even little on your side. This is improved all the time by our algorithms. The other person has almost no effect to the accuracy when you are in the bed.

Q: Will it work with memory foam mattresses / Tempur mattresses?

A: Yes, the sensor works also with memory foam mattresses.

Q: Will it work in waterbed?

A: The product works with all kind of mattresses (foam, memory foam, spring etc) but it has not been tested with water beds. I think it works even with water beds if there is only one sleeper but probably not very well in waterbeds with two sleepers.

Q: How do I pay shipping?

A: If you forgot to pay international shipping or shipping to Canada when you originally contributed, just use the overall contribution option “CONTRIBUTE NOW” to pay the shipping. Please contribute $10 more for Canada and $15 more for international shipping. There are hundreds who have forgotten and we will remind about this in the following updates and also by e-mail at some point.

story:
Short Summary

Little Ethan Robinson was born April 16th 2012 with a rare condition that required several surgeries to repair/attach his esophagus and do a colostomy a few days after birth. Some syndrome that i cannot pronounce but has this little guy down again. He is now as of this picture (8 months later) in Texas Childrens (Pedi ICU) Hospital with a double bacterial infection in an area of his body between the lungs and his chest cavity where infections are not supposed to happen. His parents are holding on to their world with their other child and trying to keep it all together. I know I've been there with my now 17 year old son and having an older son at the time/ still only 4-5yrs old; it's incredible hard on everyone. The hospital stays are long and the answers are short, but you hold on for hope and prayers that everything will be as god intended for your family.

I am posting this without the parents knowledge as they are good friends to our family and I do not know at this time that pride would not get in the way of us trying to help them via this channel.

To all those that contribute. God Bless! Remember; no one should feel they have to give or contribute anymore than what they feel they can. Only a dollar will help with bills and prayers will do the rest.

There is an account setup for the Robinson's at Amegy Bank, # 0060340545 that you can make secure contributions.

He is now as of this picture (8 months later) in Texas Childrens (Pedi ICU) Hospital with a double bacterial infection in an area of his body between the lungs and his chest cavity where infections are not supposed to happen. His parents are holding on to their world with their other child and trying to keep it all together. I know I've been there with my now 17 year old son and having an older son at the time/ still only 4-5yrs old; it's incredible hard on everyone. The hospital stays are long and the answers are short, but you hold on for hope and prayers that everything will be as god intended for your family.
I am posting this without the parents knowledge as they are good friends to our family and I do not know at this time that pride would not get in the way of us trying to help them via this channel.
To all those that contribute. God Bless! Remember; no one should feel they have to give or contribute anymore than what they feel they can. Only a dollar will help with bills and prayers will do the rest.
There is an account setup for the Robinson's at Amegy Bank, # 0060340545 that you can make secure contributions.

story:
Seniors - The forgotten people
HELP Ron HELP SENIORS

Hi everyone, my name is Ron and I need help paying $10,000 worth of bills I encountered while helping my mother as her caregiver over the past four years. I paid over $4,000 in legal and medical bills and another $2,000 in medical supplies along with other miscellaneous bills. I received no money for four years of caregiver services I provided. I am now virtually bankrupt.
Now I need help. If I could just recover half of this money $5,000! It would help greatly! Please Help.
This funding campaign is not only about me paying bills, its only the beginning for my promise to continue helping seniors citizens.
For those who aren’t familiar with caregiver work - it’s helping people who can’t help themselves. For the past four years, I took care of my bedridden mother, not only as caregiver, but as a certified nursing assistant (CNA). I was never certified because I worked for free.
Somebody had to do the work, but I was the only one willing to do the work. Seven days a week 24 hours a day. I believe that’s what family is all about. Medicare only provided us with a CNA three times a week and an RN once a month. The rest was up to me.
The fundraiser is not just about family, it’s about all of us taking care of each other. it’s true I took care of my mother for 4 years. She just turned ninety and now resides in a nursing home. It took from April 15, 2011 to June of 2012 to get her approved for Medicaid, and now over $4,000 in legal fees. When I said this campaign is about taking care of each other, its because I also am a Senior, I’m 62. After years of visiting my parents in nursing homes, I observed that there were many long term care patients who are only in their 50’s & 60’s, mostly stroke and heart attack patients. So what’s all this about? It’ll make sense shortly. After spending so many years with seniors, I had to be reminded of something I witnessed as a young boy. While attending a St Louis Cardinal baseball game, I saw a pitcher pitch who’s name was Satchel Paige. Now Satchel was believed to be in his 60’s. Way too old to be a baseball player. You see Satchel didn’t have a birth certificate. During an interview, after a game, he was teased about being too old and not knowing his own age. Satchel snapped back, “if you live long enough, you’ll get old too.”
Now Satchel made this statement over fifty years ago. I’m not sure if Satchel or other people realized what a profound statement he made. I’m amazed I still remember it.!! But all I can say is it’s probably from all my time working with seniors and getting older myself. It all came together and now makes a lot of sense. After a great amount of time thinking about Satchels’ statement, it occurred to me that this applies to all of us. Me, you and everybody. If we live long enough we’ll get old too. Then what happens to us? This is why I say Seniors - The Forgotten People..
Now unlike other countries who respect and care for their elderly, we seem to forget about them - we put them in nursing homes. I’ve seen horrible things in nursing homes. Some things so horrible, I’ve seen animals treated better in animal shelters. Do you think it’s time we do something about this? Well, I do. I think we all need to think about what Satchel said. We all will realize that this applies to all of us. Now I’m not trying to say that we need to slow down on taking care of our young. Children’s hospital, St Jude, Jerry’s Kids, Shriner’s & Medical research.
I will leave you with this final statement. If we all learn to take care of each other and respect each other the world just might be a better place too.

One more thing - my doctor at Kaiser Permanente inspired me to launch this fund raiser when he told me “mothers want to feel proud of their sons.”

story:
Godi Godar, Simon Kratzat, Andrea Wood, Candor Plaza, Clarence Jova, Zachary DeBartolo, Dean DeBoer, & the people of Lac Tumba, think NOW is time to indiegogo!

Hi, my name is Godi Godar, Founder & President of Go Conscious Earth. I am from the Lac Tumba region which is nestled in the heart of the DR of Congo. When I was eleven I dreamt that one day I would leave my tribe and travel to an unfamiliar place that would provide the opportunity to help my people. This dream landed me in Durham North Carolina.

My destiny unfolded when I returned to DR of Congo after 27 years. Upon arrival, I was immediately struck with shock by the devastating reality my people were faced with. It became my life mission to help my people and preserve our ancestral land. Shortly after returning to the United States I founded Go Conscious Earth, a nonprofit to carry out this mission.

Help Make a Difference

What we take for granted makes many sick and even die:

  • Approximately 1 billion people are affected by contaminated water annually
  • 3.75 million people die from contaminated water annually
  • This is more than aids, malaria, and measles combined

These statistics make it very clear that having reliable access to clean water is a primary human need and is central to all other health and well-being initiatives.

The Village Drill is an exciting new technology created by Village Solution's partners,  WHOlives.org, and a team of Brigham Young University engineers. Designed to drill a 4" to 8" borehole up to 250 feet (80 meters) deep, the Village Drill can reach clean water sources in a matter of days relying solely on human energy.  With this incredible new technology we can finally get ahead of the water crisis, bringing water to even the most remote areas for a fraction of the traditional costs.

Return on Investment

Each Village Drill is capable of creating significant value through drilling low-cost, high-impact wells. Completed wells are valued between $12,500 and $15,000.

Each Village Drill unit has the potential to:

  • Drill at least 20 wells per year
  • Minimum of $250,000 worth of wells -- in just one year

With 2 Village Drills in operation we could easily create $500,000 worth of wells, bringing clean water to thousands of people in the Lac Tumba region -- each and every year.

Giving Nurtures Life

Go Conscious Earth made tremendous strides in preserving biologically diverse ecosystems through the creation and management of strategic conservation areas. While we are encouraged by our supporters, our next steps are to nurture ecological health and social wellbeing by addressing water quality, soil conservation, wildlife protection, and conservation of threatened ecosystems.

Last summer’s exploration helped establish the foundation for living out one of the organization’s mission of securing the preservation and land rights for approximately 1 million acres. We were also able to distribute gravity flow water purification systems in eight villages that now have access to clean water. This June we will return to the Lac Tumba Region with a focus on water quality, collaborating with organizations like WHOlives.org the inventors of the Village Drill will aid in sustainable solutions.

Now is Your Time to indiegogo

  • Contribute today. Give graciously, generously, and to the fullest extent that you can. Go beyond "giving back". Invest in today, tomorrow, and hope.
  • Make some noise! Ask your family, friends, and co-workers to help spread the word about our campaign on Indiegogo. Check out Indiegogo's easy to use share tools above.
  • Stay connected. Check back often as our story and campaign unfolds! Connect with Go Conscious Earth through our Website, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, and/or email us at community@goconsciousearth.org

Lac Tumba Region

The Lac Tumba region of the Congo is located in the northwestern part of the Democratic Republic of the Congo, in the Bikoro Territory of Équateur Province. This region is at the heart of the Congo basin and includes both swamp and rainforest habitat. The lake covers about 765 square kilometres (295 sq mi) depending on the season, and is connected via the Irebu channel with the Congo River.

The Bantomba are the original tribal inhabitants of the region who live by means of fishing, farming and hunting. The population is 55,000 to 60,000 people. The language of the Bantomba is Lontomba. The Pygmies, who call themselves “bush men”, are the only other ethnic group that inhabits this area. It is estimated that there are approximately 10,000 Pygmies in this area, mainly in the Nsoli forest. The Bantomba and the Pygmies are both dependent on the rain forest for their way of life.

Lac Tumba Conservation Interest

The Lac Tumba region is one of the largest wetlands areas on the African continent. The lake lies at the center of the Tumba-Ngiri-Maindombe area, which is designated as a Wetland of International Importance by the Ramsar Convention in 2008. The Lake Tumba landscape, encompassing some 80,000 square kilometers in total, has one of the highest concentrations of biodiversity anywhere in the world. It contains species of conservation concern such as forest elephants (Loxodonta Africana cyclotis), the bonobo monkey (pan paniscus), forest buffalo and leopards. There are an estimated 150 species of fish, a wide variety of birds, three types of crocodile as well as hippopotamus.

The Lac Tumba region is under threat of deforestation by commercial logging interests. In January 2012, Dilo Assistance defeated an attempt by a Chinese logging company to acquire title to the land and logging rights for the Nsoli forest. The wildlife of the region is also threatened by uncontrolled poaching and over hunting.

"Mohai momo mopohe nokola elongi!"

-One person cannot do it on his own. Only a group effort will change the reality in this part of the world.

Give Thanks!

story:
SANATOU is a self-learning system that provides first line support for people seeking health advice. The founders Eberhard Scheuer and Marco Egbring have worked in the field of digital healthcare for more than a decade, and we strongly believe that knowledge about the relationship between symptoms and diseases should be accessible and affordable for everybody. Unfortunately, nowadays medicine is still practiced as an art but there are not enough doctors and health personell to master the challenges of modern healthcare in such a way. In order to do so, we need to allocate knowledge to patients to help them find the right treatment and treatment center.

People search the internet for health information when they or someone close to them suffer from health problems. In recent years we see a tsunami of health related information on the WWW. As a medical layperson you cannot decide which information is applying to you and your symptoms. SANATOU calculates the most likely diseases depending on the symptoms you entered. This is to be done on the basis of real medical cases. It is the goal of SANATOU to become the leader in decision support for health, and in the future even serve health professional as a supporting system.

With this campaign we are collecting data and funds in order to build a sophisticated database, i.e. neural network. The € 75'000 we use to harvest the data from existing hospital systems by setting up the technical infrastructure for the data extraction.

By supporting our effort you can see for yourself what symptoms are related to which diseases. In the first step we extract the information from discharge summaries of hospitals by semantic technologies and build our neural network. From experience we know that there is a „professional“ bias in discharge summaries. As a consequence, in the second step we open the system to the crowd of real patient who teach the system by providing real life symptoms, diseases, outcomes and recommendations. Even if you don't contribute money to the campaign, you can help us by providing your experience to SANATOU.

The setup of the neural network will take place during the summer and the expert system will be available in German and English starting October, 2014. It will be accompanied by an Agenda that returns recommendations to maintain your health that are tailored to your individual needs. For the individuals interested in coaching SANATOU provides disease specific coaching templates.The Share & Connect function allows you to import further information regarding Agenda items, e.g. how to prepare for a surgery or perform a self-screening. Health professionals, hospitals etc. can be linked to one diagnosis and listed as a treatment provider. For companies SANATOU offers direct access to the expert system. 

SANATOU can be accessed worldwide, however it will be operated out of Zurich and Berlin. Find more information about the project on the SANATOU website where you can also try a test version of the neural network.

story:
Our Real Goal is MUCH Bigger!

We need your help.  Why should it be important to you?  Because saving Eastleigh Farm means:

  • More than saving the cows from uncertain lives,

  • More than keeping raw milk available for the community,

  • More than preserving open space so people can enjoy the beauty of nature,

  • More than teaching our youth the values that farming teaches. 

Saving Easleigh Farm is about preserving an entire value system that includes all of the above and more.

What are some of the bigger issues that saving Eastleigh Farm addresses?

  1. What is the truth about the health benefits of "real foods" that are grown without genetic modification (non-GMO), without chemicals and WITH all the nutrients that nature provides? Think about obesity and many of the other diseases that prevail.  

  2. Is cruelty to animals necesary in farming?  Can a balance be found where animals are treated with respect, caring and grattude for the food they produce?

  3. What happens to our health if we no longer have the ability to leave the stresses behind and enjoy a place of open space and freedom from the pressures and pollution that development brings?

  4. Who really benefits if we no longer can show our children the differences and teach them through experience?

  5. How can we teach a value system that is core to our keeping our country great and yet could disappear with the lifestyle if we do nothing?  We need the examples.  We need Eastleigh Farm!

Here are just a few things we need to keep these values and Eastleigh alive:

  • Constructing a maintenance building
  • Putting new roofs on the barns 
  • Renovating the fence lines
  • Repairing tractors and equipment (some of these date to the early 1900s and are truly vintage equipment)
  • Re-seeding the many fields and pastures
  • Keeping the cows and calves healthy and happy
  • Paying the mortgage. (Perhaps this should be at the top of the list! :-)

Please keep your contributions coming. They are immediately being put to great use.  The goal themometer is not the true goal.  We need more.

Eastleigh Farm Exemplifies what made America Great!

If there ever was an impact on America, it's America's farmers through their value systems, the growth from small farms to huge agricultural corporations, from initially "organic" methods to now GMO and chemical proliferation,  and from the amount of available acreage now being encroached by growing development. 

Eastleigh Farm is trying to remain viable in one of the most developed areas of the country, Framingham, MA.  It exemplifies the small farmer and their fight for the standard of farming and healthy living that supported the growth of our country. 

Eastleigh Farm is dedicated to humane and respectful treatment of its cows, preserving open space, and advocating for the health benefits and availability of raw milk and non-GMO, chemical free farming.  It represents a lifestyle: healthy living and educating our children about the fact that real food is better, and it's possible to eat AND treat our animals humanely.

Open space is core to giving our lives beauty. When we allow our animals the respect to share that space in exchange for their energy to provide us with healthy, nutrient dense food, things stay in balance. They are never slaughtered, and instead retired to pasture when they can no longer produce milk. 

All of this is why we've become a nonprofit - to educate youth and share these facts.  So contribute and enjoy the perks for doing so!  Enjoy leaving your legacy to make the world a better place.

Have Fun as a Raw Milk Dairy Farmer
(Without All the Work)

With all the virtual games about farming and animals, we thought it would be a great opportunity to share some real fun with people.  

We've created several ways you can participate as a farmer:

  • From the comfort of your home, and/or

  • For a visit in person to Eastleigh Farm, and/or

  • For a weekend in person to learn the ancient art of dairy farming.  You will milk cows, bottle the milk, make chees and ice cream.  Yum!

Check out the perks to the right to choose the one best for you.

Having a dairy farm is constant work and expense.  Yet it's well worth it for the mental and physical health of all concerned.  In fact, there's an entire food movement based on the teaching and science of whole, natural foods, much to the disdain of many huge, processed food manufacturers. This is an important subject, and one we cover below, so please keep reading to learn more about Eastleigh Farm.

Most importantly, join the fun by contributing and sponsoring a share of Eastleigh Farm.  Without your support, Eastleigh Farm could be lost to development, and we would lose an important example of how a working, raw milk dairy can actually provide not just healthy and delicious dairy products, but a place to teach and learn, decompress and de-stress and balance the gifts the cows give with the respect we return to them in gratitude. 

Due to this goal of educating people about healthy living and humanely treating the animals that work daily to provide us food rich in nutrients, we have recently created Eastleigh Farm Educational Foundation. Your contributions are tax-deductable.

Naturally, you'll be well acknowledged and appreciated for doing so. See our "Perks" to the right, and pick the one most appealing to you.  You'll be saving an important farm, supporting a great cause and helping future generations stay healthy.  Without your support, Eastleigh Farm could be lost to commercial development.

Last Expanse of Open Land in Framingham, MA.

Eastleigh Farm was established in the early 1900’s.  It stayed in the same family, operating as a Guernsey dairy until 1981.  This farm, as an important part of the community, was responsible for a lot of the improvements being brought to the area like the sewer, clean water and more.  Originally 468 acres, some refer to this farm as the jewel of Framingham.

 In 1981, the farm was transferred to a local businessman who owned it until 1996, operating as a beef farm.  A developer bought and owned it for six years, continuing to utilize the pastures to raise beef.  Eight years ago, I began the process of reconverting the facility to a dairy operation.  For me, it was a dream-come-true due to the fact that I worked on this farm as a kid.


Natural Dairy Products:  Sold Out Every Week

Through its most recent history, only natural land enhancements have been used including organic fish oil and seaweed, to supplement the growing of grass and hay used at the farm.  Having been involved in the dairy business all of my life, I have never used pesticides or artificial enhancements in any of the farm operations.

The operation is very close to being organic without being certified.  Our raw milk is only available from our farm store.  It is produced according to the strict regulation of the Department of Agriculture.  A release form is required for all raw product sales according to state law.

In truth, raw milk is more healthy than any processed or pasteurized milk purchased in the store.  You can find out more about the health and taste advantages of raw milk by visiting the Weston Price Foundation website, but first, make a contribution now for Eastleigh Farm, or be certain to return and do so.  Eastleigh must raise money now to keep providing this nutrient rich, raw milk and keep educating people about its benefits.

Previously, the milk produced was sold into the Federal milk pool.  I decided that the best way to serve the farm and potential customers was to sell the products on the farm.  In addition to raw milk produced on the farm, locally produced cheeses, eggs, fresh breads, honey and many other products are available by coming to the farm.

The State of Massachusetts is currently looking at legislation that would allow raw milk to be sold in stores and delivered.  When this happens, our "market" will explode with demand growing rapidly. This event will help sustain Eastleigh Farm if we can survive until then.  Your contribution will help assure we experience this delight.

Our “Girls” are Appreciated Family Members. 

The "girls" are pastured and grass fed throughout most of the year. Problems which would automatically result in cows or calves being put down are instead treated. Very often, they recover and thrive.

Our girls never feel the need to flinch and often respond to hearing their names. We hold a commitment to never losing our humanity, our compassion or our respect for all that these cows give to life.

The herd consists of mostly Jerseys (high in butter fat) with a few Guernseys, and Brown Swiss. All of the cattle are born and raised on the two farms that are within close proximity to each other in Framingham, Massachusetts.

We graze our 300 cow herd on our own pastures, using the cows to naturally improve the soil and sustain the land. Allowing the cows fresh air, sunshine and green grass promotes their health and the quality of our products.

The Local Community Loves Us.

Volunteers ranging from little children through elders help with the 140 or so calves and with milking. I have experienced innumerable expressions of gratitude from people filled with happiness to experience a dairy which simultaneously cares for it's cows as family. It is difficult to put into words how this place has become a place of miracles. Young people have left self destructive lives behind, working here and taking care of the herd.

Why We Need Your Help

Small farming businesses have been hit hard with the failing economy.  Although our delicious, raw milk is constantly in demand, overall people have resorted to less healthy, cheaper foods.  The cost of maintaining a farm has increased as the cost of fuel has increased along with the cost of needed products. 

As a nation, we need to stop and really see how processed foods are robbing us of our health.  We need to slow down and appreciate the natural and rural way of life where stress is not a chronic disease.  We need to keep the rural life alive for our children and generations to come.

Due to my dedication and love for Eastleigh Farm as one of the last open expanses of land and for the cows and people who have helped keep the farm alive, I have used my own resources to maintain it.  I can no longer do this, and must rely on the American people as a whole to recognize the need to keep the small farms alive and healthy. 

Our failing economy is bringing people to their senses in many ways.  The important things in life are becoming more apparent.  I’m hoping that you will recognize the need to preserve organic farms and specifically to help Eastleigh Farm  stay alive and resilient so we can show how the small farmer is still the foundation of our country and certainly of our country’s health, both physical and mental.  We have jobs and lives to protect including those of the cows and farm animals.  It is possible to live and thrive humanely.

Every contribution helps.  Please spread the word by sharing the link above underneath the video and by posting comments on your own social media.  Become a friend to our Facebook page, share our comments and post your own there.  Activity on our Facebook page increases our importance in the Facebook newsfeed.  You can help make this happen.  Help spread the word,  Contribute. We can use all the help we can get.
story_txt:
Our Real Goal is MUCH Bigger!

We need your help.  Why should it be important to you?  Because saving Eastleigh Farm means:

More than saving the cows from uncertain lives,

More than keeping raw milk available for the community,

More than preserving open space so people can enjoy the beauty of nature,

More than teaching our youth the values that farming teaches. 
Saving Easleigh Farm is about preserving an entire value system that includes all of the above and more.
What are some of the bigger issues that saving Eastleigh Farm addresses?

What is the truth about the health benefits of "real foods" that are grown without genetic modification (non-GMO), without chemicals and WITH all the nutrients that nature provides? Think about obesity and many of the other diseases that prevail.  


Is cruelty to animals necesary in farming?  Can a balance be found where animals are treated with respect, caring and grattude for the food they produce?

What happens to our health if we no longer have the ability to leave the stresses behind and enjoy a place of open space and freedom from the pressures and pollution that development brings?

Who really benefits if we no longer can show our children the differences and teach them through experience?

How can we teach a value system that is core to our keeping our country great and yet could disappear with the lifestyle if we do nothing?  We need the examples.  We need Eastleigh Farm!

Here are just a few things we need to keep these values and Eastleigh alive:

Constructing a maintenance building
Putting new roofs on the barns 
Renovating the fence lines
Repairing tractors and equipment (some of these date to the early 1900s and are truly vintage equipment)
Re-seeding the many fields and pastures
Keeping the cows and calves healthy and happy
Paying the mortgage. (Perhaps this should be at the top of the list! :-)
Please keep your contributions coming. They are immediately being put to great use.  The goal themometer is not the true goal.  We need more.
Eastleigh Farm Exemplifies what made America Great!
If there ever was an impact on America, it's America's farmers through their value systems, the growth from small farms to huge agricultural corporations, from initially "organic" methods to now GMO and chemical proliferation,  and from the amount of available acreage now being encroached by growing development. 
Eastleigh Farm is trying to remain viable in one of the most developed areas of the country, Framingham, MA.  It exemplifies the small farmer and their fight for the standard of farming and healthy living that supported the growth of our country. 
Eastleigh Farm is dedicated to humane and respectful treatment of its cows, preserving open space, and advocating for the health benefits and availability of raw milk and non-GMO, chemical free farming.  It represents a lifestyle: healthy living and educating our children about the fact that real food is better, and it's possible to eat AND treat our animals humanely.
Open space is core to giving our lives beauty. When we allow our animals the respect to share that space in exchange for their energy to provide us with healthy, nutrient dense food, things stay in balance. They are never slaughtered, and instead retired to pasture when they can no longer produce milk. 
All of this is why we've become a nonprofit - to educate youth and share these facts.  So contribute and enjoy the perks for doing so!  Enjoy leaving your legacy to make the world a better place.
Have Fun as a Raw Milk Dairy Farmer(Without All the Work)
With all the virtual games about farming and animals, we thought it would be a great opportunity to share some real fun with people.  
We've created several ways you can participate as a farmer:

From the comfort of your home, and/or

For a visit in person to Eastleigh Farm, and/or

For a weekend in person to learn the ancient art of dairy farming.  You will milk cows, bottle the milk, make chees and ice cream.  Yum!
Check out the perks to the right to choose the one best for you.
Having a dairy farm is constant work and expense.  Yet it's well worth it for the mental and physical health of all concerned.  In fact, there's an entire food movement based on the teaching and science of whole, natural foods, much to the disdain of many huge, processed food manufacturers. This is an important subject, and one we cover below, so please keep reading to learn more about Eastleigh Farm.
Most importantly, join the fun by contributing and sponsoring a share of Eastleigh Farm.  Without your support, Eastleigh Farm could be lost to development, and we would lose an important example of how a working, raw milk dairy can actually provide not just healthy and delicious dairy products, but a place to teach and learn, decompress and de-stress and balance the gifts the cows give with the respect we return to them in gratitude. 
Due to this goal of educating people about healthy living and humanely treating the animals that work daily to provide us food rich in nutrients, we have recently created Eastleigh Farm Educational Foundation. Your contributions are tax-deductable.
Naturally, you'll be well acknowledged and appreciated for doing so. See our "Perks" to the right, and pick the one most appealing to you.  You'll be saving an important farm, supporting a great cause and helping future generations stay healthy.  Without your support, Eastleigh Farm could be lost to commercial development.
Last Expanse of Open Land in Framingham, MA.
Eastleigh Farm was established in the early 1900’s.  It stayed in the same family, operating as a Guernsey dairy until 1981.  This farm, as an important part of the community, was responsible for a lot of the improvements being brought to the area like the sewer, clean water and more.  Originally 468 acres, some refer to this farm as the jewel of Framingham.
 In 1981, the farm was transferred to a local businessman who owned it until 1996, operating as a beef farm.  A developer bought and owned it for six years, continuing to utilize the pastures to raise beef.  Eight years ago, I began the process of reconverting the facility to a dairy operation.  For me, it was a dream-come-true due to the fact that I worked on this farm as a kid.

Natural Dairy Products:  Sold Out Every Week

Through its most recent history, only natural land enhancements have been used including organic fish oil and seaweed, to supplement the growing of grass and hay used at the farm.  Having been involved in the dairy business all of my life, I have never used pesticides or artificial enhancements in any of the farm operations.
The operation is very close to being organic without being certified.  Our raw milk is only available from our farm store.  It is produced according to the strict regulation of the Department of Agriculture.  A release form is required for all raw product sales according to state law.
In truth, raw milk is more healthy than any processed or pasteurized milk purchased in the store.  You can find out more about the health and taste advantages of raw milk by visiting the Weston Price Foundation website, but first, make a contribution now for Eastleigh Farm, or be certain to return and do so.  Eastleigh must raise money now to keep providing this nutrient rich, raw milk and keep educating people about its benefits.
Previously, the milk produced was sold into the Federal milk pool.  I decided that the best way to serve the farm and potential customers was to sell the products on the farm.  In addition to raw milk produced on the farm, locally produced cheeses, eggs, fresh breads, honey and many other products are available by coming to the farm.
The State of Massachusetts is currently looking at legislation that would allow raw milk to be sold in stores and delivered.  When this happens, our "market" will explode with demand growing rapidly. This event will help sustain Eastleigh Farm if we can survive until then.  Your contribution will help assure we experience this delight.

Our “Girls” are Appreciated Family Members. 

The "girls" are pastured and grass fed throughout most of the year. Problems which would automatically result in cows or calves being put down are instead treated. Very often, they recover and thrive.
Our girls never feel the need to flinch and often respond to hearing their names. We hold a commitment to never losing our humanity, our compassion or our respect for all that these cows give to life.
The herd consists of mostly Jerseys (high in butter fat) with a few Guernseys, and Brown Swiss. All of the cattle are born and raised on the two farms that are within close proximity to each other in Framingham, Massachusetts.
We graze our 300 cow herd on our own pastures, using the cows to naturally improve the soil and sustain the land. Allowing the cows fresh air, sunshine and green grass promotes their health and the quality of our products.
The Local Community Loves Us.
Volunteers ranging from little children through elders help with the 140 or so calves and with milking. I have experienced innumerable expressions of gratitude from people filled with happiness to experience a dairy which simultaneously cares for it's cows as family. It is difficult to put into words how this place has become a place of miracles. Young people have left self destructive lives behind, working here and taking care of the herd.
Why We Need Your Help
Small farming businesses have been hit hard with the failing economy.  Although our delicious, raw milk is constantly in demand, overall people have resorted to less healthy, cheaper foods.  The cost of maintaining a farm has increased as the cost of fuel has increased along with the cost of needed products. 
As a nation, we need to stop and really see how processed foods are robbing us of our health.  We need to slow down and appreciate the natural and rural way of life where stress is not a chronic disease.  We need to keep the rural life alive for our children and generations to come.
Due to my dedication and love for Eastleigh Farm as one of the last open expanses of land and for the cows and people who have helped keep the farm alive, I have used my own resources to maintain it.  I can no longer do this, and must rely on the American people as a whole to recognize the need to keep the small farms alive and healthy. 
Our failing economy is bringing people to their senses in many ways.  The important things in life are becoming more apparent.  I’m hoping that you will recognize the need to preserve organic farms and specifically to help Eastleigh Farm  stay alive and resilient so we can show how the small farmer is still the foundation of our country and certainly of our country’s health, both physical and mental.  We have jobs and lives to protect including those of the cows and farm animals.  It is possible to live and thrive humanely.
Every contribution helps.  Please spread the word by sharing the link above underneath the video and by posting comments on your own social media.  Become a friend to our Facebook page, share our comments and post your own there.  Activity on our Facebook page increases our importance in the Facebook newsfeed.  You can help make this happen.  Help spread the word,  Contribute. We can use all the help we can get.

story:
Motivación

- ¿Sabes dónde está tu historial médico, a cuantos médicos has ido, qué te han dicho...?

- ¿Te acuerdas cómo se llamaba el Otorrino al que fuiste la última vez?

- ¿Cada cuantas horas y cuantos días tengo que tomar la medicina?

- ¿Dónde busco el teléfono de mi médico de cabecera?

- ¿Cuando tengo la próxima cita médica el miércoles o el jueves...? ¿A las 7 o las 8?

- ¿Por qué no gestionas tu propio historial médico?

 

Motivation

- Do you know where is your medical history? Do you know how many doctors have you visited? And...  What did they say to you...?

- Do you remember the name of the ENT you went last time?

- How often and how many days do I have to take this medicine...?

- Where do I find the phone of my GP?

- When do I have the next appointment on Wednesday or Thursday ...? At 4 PM or 5 PM?

- Why do not you manage YOUR OWN MEDICAL HISTORY?

 

¿Qué es mDoctor?

mDoctor es una aplicación (para tu smartphone) que te ayudará a gestionar:

  • Tu lista de médicos
    • con todos los datos de contacto

  • Tus citas médicas
    • con avisos

  • Tus medicinas
    • con los datos de la prescripción

  • Tu historial médico
  • y más...

 

What is mDoctor?

mDoctor is an application (for a smartphone) that will help you manage:

  • Your doctor' s directory
    • with all contact details...

    •
  • Your medical appointments
    • with warnings...
  • Your medicines
    • with prescription data...

    •
  • Your medical health history

    •
  • and more ...

Diseño

En la fase de diseño en la que nos encontramos, tenemos muy claro que la aplicación debe ser: sencilla y fácil de entender , funcional y fluida en cuanto al uso y potente, es decir que tenga todo lo que esperamos de ella y más.

Para ello (desde el punto de vista del diseño) estudiamos desde cuantos elementos debería tener un menú, su posición para que sea fácil de acceder él con una sola mano... hasta el tipo y tamaño de letra óptimos para cada elemento, cómo y por dónde deben aparecer las diferentes pantallas...

Design

The design phase in which we are, we are convinced that the application should be: simple and easy to understand, functional and fluent in the user experience and powerful, ie that it includes all you expect of it and more.

For it (from the point of view of design) we study from how many menu items should have, its position to be easily accessed with one hand..., to the font type and size optimal for each element, how and where should the screens  have to appear...

Características

Estamos abiertos a todo tipo de sugerencias y además las agradecemos. Ahora es el momento.

Características mínimas que podemos esperar:

  • Crear tu propia lista de médicos, ordenados por especialidades:

    • con todos los datos necesarios para su contacto y localización como un mapa...

  • Crear citas, con avisos y alarmas

  • Anotar todo lo relativo a la prescripción del médico (por ejemplo qué medicinas tenemos que tomar...)

  • Crear tu propio historial (basado en las citas, consultas)...:

    • Anota lo que te pasaba,

    • Anota lo que te dijo el médico

    • Anota las medicinas que te prescribió y su posología

  • Varios idiomas

  • Fácil de usar: Ni un botón de más ni un menú de menos

  • Potente: Alarmas, mapas, mails, etc...

  • Útil: Todo lo relacionado con mi salud en la palma de la mano.

En función de los apoyos y objetivos que vayamos cumpliendo, además podemos contar con:

  • Tus sugerencias.

  • Extras:

    • Poder exportar e importar tu propio historial

    • Estadísticas de historial o "timeline"

    • Utilidad para los doctores para que te envíen directamente las medicinas a tomar con la posología correspondiente

    • Utilidad para los doctores para que te envíen directamente la cita...

Features

We are open to all suggestions and also thank them. Now is the time.

Minimum requirements we can expect:

  • Create your own doctors list, sorted by specialties:

    • ... with all necessary data for contacting and location such as a map

  • Create appointments, with warnings and alarms

  • Write down everything related to the doctor's prescription (eg what medicines you have to take …)

  • Create your own record (based on the appointments) ...:

    • Write down what was the problem,

    • Record what did the doctor said

    • Record the medicines prescribed to you and its posology

  • Several languages

  • Easy to use: Not a button more or a menu more less

  • Powerful: Alarms, maps, emails, etc ...

  • Useful: Everything about my health in the palm of your hand.

Depending on the supports and objectives that we met, and we have:

  • Your suggestions.

  • Extras:

    • Export and import your own history feature

    • Health history or "timeline" Stats feature

    • A utility for doctors to directly send you the medicines to take with the corresponding posology

    • A utility for doctors to directly send you the appointment ...

Contribución

En el valor de cada contribución están incluidos conceptos como, además de todas las horas que pasamos pensando en todos los detalles para que no falte de nada, las horas de diseño, las horas de programación las horas de test, etc. así como todos los trabajos posteriores para las mejoras de la aplicación.
También contribuyes al beneficio social que la aplicación aportará a la comunidad de usuarios en todos los sentidos.

Como creemos de verdad en su utilidad, queremos que la aplicación llegue al mayor número de personas y hemos decidido no pasar de los 5$. Estimamos que la aplicación posteriormente saldrá a la venta por un precio de entre 7$ y 10$ con lo cual el ahorro para todos los que apoyáis el proyecto sería de entre un 30% y un 50%.

Gracias por tu contribución:

 

  • Apoyo el proyecto 1€: Gracias...

  • Solo: 5€: app

  • Solo Plus: 8€: app + inclusión de tu nombre en la lista de "contributors"

  • Couple: 9€: 2 X app

  • Couple Plus: 14€: 2 X app + inclusión de tu nombre en la lista de "contributors"

  • Family: 16€: 4 X app

  • Family Plus:  25€: 4X app + inclusión de tu nombre en la lista de "contributors"

  • Doctor: 100€: app + Utilidad para enviar citas y prescripciones a las aplicaciones de sus pacientes

  • Doctor Plus: 150€: app + Utilidad para enviar citas y prescripciones a las aplicaciones de sus pacientes + inclusión de tu nombre en la lista de "contributors"

Contribution

In the value of each contribution are included concepts such as, besides all the hours we spend thinking about all the details so you do not miss anything, research hours, the hours of designing, programming hours, testing hours, etc.. as well as all subsequent work for application enhancements.
Also you contribute to social benefits that the application will provide the user community in all ways.

As we truly believe in its usefulness, we want the application to reach the greatest number of people and we decided not to rise the 5€ price. We estimate that the application will be released later for a price of between 7€ and 10€ with which the savings for everyone who support the project would be between 30% and 50%.

Thanks for your contribution:

  • I support the project 1€: Thanks ...

  • Solo: 5€: app

  • Solo Plus: 8€: app + with the inclusion of your name on the list of "contributors"

  • Couple: 9€: 2 X app

  • Couple Plus: 14€: 2 X app + with the inclusion of your name on the list of "contributors"

  • Family: 16€: 4 X app

  • Family Plus: 25€: 4X app + with the inclusion of your name on the list of "contributors"

  • Doctor: 100€: app + Utility to send appointments and prescriptions to their patients applications

  • Doctor Plus: 150€: app + Utility to send appointments and prescriptions to their patients + with the inclusion of your name on the list of "contributors"

 

 

Objetivos

  • 2.000€ Proyecto en marcha!
  • 4.000€ Tablet (iPad) versión!
  • 8.000€ Exportar / importar tus datos!
  • 12.000€ Otras plataformas!

Stretch Goals

  • 2,000€ Yes, we are on!
  • 4,000€ Tablet (iPad) version!
  • 8,000€ Exporting / importing your data!
  • 12,000€ Other platforms!

 

Desarrollo

Aunque ya hemos empezado con la fase de diseño, calculamos que este proyecto en su versión normal no debería tardar mas de 2 meses en su realización. La utilidad para médicos tardaría un poco más...

 

Development

Although we started with the design phase, we estimate that this project in its standard version should not take more than two months. The doctors utility will take a little longer …

 

 

Distribución

Aquí podéis ayudarnos con vuestras ideas, pero en principio, una vez desarrollada la aplicación, os enviaremos una mail para ponernos de acuerdo en el día en que os la podréis descargar de la AppStore... Recibiréis un código por mail.

Contactaremos previamente con los que hayáis elegido las pociones "plus" para pedir vuestros datos que aparecerán en la "lista de sponsors".

 

Distribution

Here you can help us with your ideas, but initially, once developed the application, We will send you a mail to agree on the day that you can download it from the AppStore ... You will receive a code by mail.

Previously we will contact those who have chosen the  "Plus" option to ask for what would you like that will appear in the "List of Sponsors"

 

Riesgos y desafíos

Todo proyecto tiene sus riesgos. Como este no es un proyecto en el que estén involucrados proveedores, materiales, fábricas, exportaciones, aduanas, etc. el riesgo de que algo salga mal es mínimo...

Este es mi primer proyecto pero tengo amplia experiencia en el desarrollo de aplicaciones para móviles.

En caso de no alcanzar el mínimo estimado para su desarrollo... no dejaré "en la estacada" a nadie. Realizaré la aplicación igualmente, para la plataforma iOS y estudiaría cómo hacerlo para otras...

Al alcanzar el objetivo para desarrollar la aplicación en otras plataformas: Android y Windos Phone, el desafío es estudiar cual es la mejor forma de hacerlo lo que afectaría algo al tiempo de realización.

Tenemos que estudiar ,en caso de alcanzar el objetivo para la exportación/importación de tus datos, la mejor forma y más segura de hacerlo, teniendo en cuenta de lo " delicado" de los datos.

También puede haber otros riesgos que se me "escapan" ahora, claro, pero yo creo que mínimos...

 

Risks and Challenges

Every project has risks. As this is not a project that are involved suppliers, materials, manufacturing, exports, customs, etc.. the risk of something going wrong is minimal ...

This is my first project, but I have wide experience in developing mobile applications.

In case of not achieve the minimum estimate for development ... I will not let anyone down. I will develop the App for the iOS platform and study how to do it for other platforms...

In achieving the objective to develop the application on other platforms: Android and Windos Phone, the challenge is to study what is the best way to do it and would affect completion time (for this platforms).

We have to study, if we reach the target for export / import your data, the best and safest way to do it, taking into account the "sensitive" data.

 

 

Gracias

- Gracias por aportar tu grano de arena, aunque sea pequeño

- Gracias por confiar en este proyecto

- Gracias por tu contribución económica

- Gracias por aportar tus ideas

 

Thanks

- Thanks for contributing your bit...

- Thank you for trusting this project

- Thank you for your financial contribution

- Thanks for contributing with your ideas

A utility for doctors to directly send you the appointment ...




Contribución
En el valor de cada contribución están incluidos conceptos como, además de todas las horas que pasamos pensando en todos los detalles para que no falte de nada, las horas de diseño, las horas de programación las horas de test, etc. así como todos los trabajos posteriores para las mejoras de la aplicación.
  También contribuyes al beneficio social que la aplicación aportará a la comunidad de usuarios en todos los sentidos.
Como creemos de verdad en su utilidad, queremos que la aplicación llegue al mayor número de personas y hemos decidido no pasar de los 5$. Estimamos que la aplicación posteriormente saldrá a la venta por un precio de entre 7$ y 10$ con lo cual el ahorro para todos los que apoyáis el proyecto sería de entre un 30% y un 50%.
Gracias por tu contribución:
 



Apoyo el proyecto 1€: Gracias...


Solo: 5€: app


Solo Plus: 8€: app + inclusión de tu nombre en la lista de "contributors"


Couple: 9€: 2 X app


Couple Plus: 14€: 2 X app + inclusión de tu nombre en la lista de "contributors"


Family: 16€: 4 X app


Family Plus:  25€: 4X app + inclusión de tu nombre en la lista de "contributors"


Doctor: 100€: app + Utilidad para enviar citas y prescripciones a las aplicaciones de sus pacientes


Doctor Plus: 150€: app + Utilidad para enviar citas y prescripciones a las aplicaciones de sus pacientes + inclusión de tu nombre en la lista de "contributors"


Contribution
In the value of each contribution are included concepts such as, besides all the hours we spend thinking about all the details so you do not miss anything, research hours, the hours of designing, programming hours, testing hours, etc.. as well as all subsequent work for application enhancements.
  Also you contribute to social benefits that the application will provide the user community in all ways.
As we truly believe in its usefulness, we want the application to reach the greatest number of people and we decided not to rise the 5€ price. We estimate that the application will be released later for a price of between 7€ and 10€ with which the savings for everyone who support the project would be between 30% and 50%.
Thanks for your contribution:


I support the project 1€: Thanks ...


Solo: 5€: app


Solo Plus: 8€: app + with the inclusion of your name on the list of "contributors"


Couple: 9€: 2 X app


Couple Plus: 14€: 2 X app + with the inclusion of your name on the list of "contributors"


Family: 16€: 4 X app


Family Plus: 25€: 4X app + with the inclusion of your name on the list of "contributors"


Doctor: 100€: app + Utility to send appointments and prescriptions to their patients applications


Doctor Plus: 150€: app + Utility to send appointments and prescriptions to their patients + with the inclusion of your name on the list of "contributors"

 

 
Objetivos

2.000€ Proyecto en marcha!
4.000€ Tablet (iPad) versión!
8.000€ Exportar / importar tus datos!
12.000€ Otras plataformas!
Stretch Goals

2,000€ Yes, we are on!
4,000€ Tablet (iPad) version!
8,000€ Exporting / importing your data!
12,000€ Other platforms!
 

Desarrollo
Aunque ya hemos empezado con la fase de diseño, calculamos que este proyecto en su versión normal no debería tardar mas de 2 meses en su realización. La utilidad para médicos tardaría un poco más...
 
Development
 Although
  we started with the design phase, we estimate that this project in
its standard version should not take more than two months. The doctors utility will take a little longer …
 

 
Distribución
Aquí podéis ayudarnos con vuestras ideas, pero en principio, una vez desarrollada la aplicación, os enviaremos una mail para ponernos de acuerdo en el día en que os la podréis descargar de la AppStore... Recibiréis un código por mail.
Contactaremos previamente con los que hayáis elegido las pociones "plus" para pedir vuestros datos que aparecerán en la "lista de sponsors".
 
Distribution
 Here
you can help us with your ideas, but initially, once developed the
application, We will send you a mail to agree on the day that you can
download it from the AppStore ... You will receive a code by mail.


Previously we will contact those who have chosen the  "Plus" option to ask for what would you like that will appear in the "List of Sponsors"
 
Riesgos y desafíos

Todo proyecto tiene sus riesgos. Como este no es un proyecto en el que
  estén involucrados proveedores, materiales, fábricas,
  exportaciones, aduanas, etc. el riesgo de que algo salga mal es
  mínimo...
Este
  es mi primer proyecto pero tengo amplia experiencia en el desarrollo
  de aplicaciones para móviles.
En
  caso de no alcanzar el mínimo estimado para su desarrollo... no
  dejaré "en la estacada" a nadie. Realizaré la aplicación
  igualmente, para la plataforma iOS y estudiaría cómo hacerlo para
  otras...
Al
  alcanzar el objetivo para desarrollar la aplicación en otras
  plataformas: Android y Windos Phone, el desafío es estudiar cual es
  la mejor forma de hacerlo lo que  afectaría algo al tiempo de
  realización.
Tenemos
  que estudiar ,en caso de alcanzar el objetivo para la
  exportación/importación de tus datos, la mejor forma y más segura
  de hacerlo, teniendo en cuenta de lo " delicado" de los datos.
También
  puede haber otros riesgos que se me "escapan" ahora, claro, pero
  yo creo que mínimos...
 
Risks and Challenges
Every project has risks. As this is not a project that are involved suppliers, materials, manufacturing, exports, customs, etc.. the risk of something going wrong is minimal ...
This is my first project, but I have wide experience in developing mobile applications.
In case of not achieve the minimum estimate for development ... I will not let anyone down. I will develop the App for the iOS platform and study how to do it for other platforms...
In achieving the objective to develop the application on other platforms: Android and Windos Phone, the challenge is to study what is the best way to do it and would affect completion time (for this platforms).
We have to study, if we reach the target for export / import your data, the best and safest way to do it, taking into account the "sensitive" data.
 

 
Gracias

 - Gracias
por aportar tu grano de arena, aunque sea pequeño

- Gracias
  por confiar en este proyecto
- Gracias
  por tu contribución económica
- Gracias
  por aportar tus ideas
 
Thanks
- Thanks for contributing your bit...
- Thank you for trusting this project
- Thank you for your financial contribution
- Thanks for contributing with your ideas

story:
Passionate about cars? We are too.

And we've designed a stunner. Our small-scale models were a smash hit with fans and investors at Top Mark Monaco. The next step is to produce a full-scale model. Together, we can bring our powerful new car to the world. We know you'll be thrilled to meet her.



Presentation of the project and the company

Akylone is the model of SAS Genty Automobile, new French automobile manufacturer of luxury cars.

This project has for goal the conception of a sport vehicle in  the category of "hypercar", it's mean, a vehicle which has a power with 4 figures.

Insanity you will say ?

Sure, but this project is in the first time a showcase to promote new technologies.

Akylone est le premier modèle de la SAS Genty Automobile, nouveau constructeur automobile Français de véhicule de luxe.

Ce projet réside dans la conception d'un véhicule de sport de type "hypercar", c'est à dire, un  véhicule dont la puissance s'écrit avec 4 chiffres. 

Déraisonnable me direz-vous ?

Peut-être bien que oui, mais ce type de projet est avant tout une vitrine destinée à promouvoir les nouvelles technologies.



This Hypercar is the outcome of a unique technologic pool of expertise combined to the use of state-of-the-art materials.

Its harmonious lines sublimated by a finish of exception settles the Akylone as a legitimate heir of the prestigious French arts and crafts values.

Cet Hypercar est l'aboutissement d'un savoir faire technologique unique allié à l'emploi de matériaux de pointe. Grâce à ses lignes harmonieuses sublimées par sa finition d'exception, elle se pose en héritière des valeurs de l'artisanat de prestige en France. 


AKYLONE represent the subtle alchemy between the ultimate performance and the emotion that only genuine work of art can arouse.

AKYLONE représente la subtile alchimie entre les performances sans compromis et l'émotion que seule peut susciter une véritable œuvre d'art.


The fund raising

The purpose of this fund raising is to help us finance the realization of an inside and outside  full-scale model, that we will present to potential investors and clients during a world tour planned for end 2014.

We need the support of all to raise enough funds and make this operation possible.

Cette levée de fonds a pour but de nous aider à financer la réalisation d'une maquette échelle 1, intérieur / extérieur ainsi qu'une tournée internationale fin 2014 destinée à présenter AKYLONE a des investisseurs et clients potentiels.

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

Support us and receive a present




You are fan of the Akylone project and you are waiting to see it, to touch it ?


Don't wait any more, get it now the only one model at scale ¼ of Akylone hypercar. A unique piece reproducing faithfully the design of the concept car.

This model has been realized by Materialise company, in « stéréolithographie » which let make strong prototypes with a digital base, the finish was made by Genty Automobile.

This model has for sizes 44 inch lenght and 21,6 inch width. Its weight is 25kg in which we have to add the transport box which has been used especialy for the Top Marque Monaco Show in 2013, the event including actors of luxury. It was for this event that Genty Automobile revealed for the first time the model of the project.

So, you can obtain this real work of art for the price of 20 000€. From your order, it will available one month and a half after.


Vous êtes fan du projet Akylone et vous êtes dans l'attente de la voir, de la toucher ? N'attendez plus, procurez-vous dès maintenant la seule modélisation à l'échelle ¼ de l'hypercar Akylone. Une pièce unique reproduisant fidèlement le design du concept car.

Cette maquette a été réalisée par la société Materialise, en stéréolithographie qui permet de fabriquer des prototype solides à partir d'un modèle numérique, la finition quant à elle a été faite par les membres même de Genty Automobile.

Cette modélisation a pour dimension 1,12m de longueur et 0,55m de largeur. Son poids d'origine est de 25kg auquel il faut y ajouter la caisse de transport ayant été utilisé spécialement pour Top Marques Monaco, le salon regroupant toutes les acteurs du luxe. C'est à cet événement que le projet a été pour la première fois dévoilé avec cette maquette reproduisant fidèlement le modèle.

Vous pouvez donc obtenir cette véritable œuvre d'art pour la somme de 20 000€. Dès votre commande, elle sera disponible 1 mois et demi après.
